tool_description: Get the latest FIFA World Cup Schedule and Stats
name: FIFA 2022 Schedule and Stats
title: FIFA 2022 Schedule and Stats

api_list.name: Get matches on a specific date
api_list.description:
Parameters:
1.  date - Date to query the matches
2. utc_offset - Change the utc offset of the date to suit your timezone.

Returns the matches on the specified date and timezone.
Works for both historical, live, and future dates.
Match data consists of date, time, home team, away team, and many more, see the example response for an example.

optional_parameters.name: utc_offset
optional_parameters.description: UTC Offset for timezone (Must be between -12 to 14)
